mapper.select: SELECT shop.ID,shop.SHOPNAME,shop.ISSHOW,shop.PRIORITY,shop.COMPANYID,shop.ADDRESS, shop.SERVICEPHONE,GROUP_CONCAT( sf.NICKNAME ) AS STAFFNAMES FROM hm_pub_shop shop LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group grp ON grp.SHOPID = shop.ID AND shop.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff rela ON rela.GROUPID = grp.GROUPID AND rela.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff sf ON sf.ID = rela.STAFFID AND rela.COMPANYID = sf.COMPANYID AND sf.ISDEL = 0 WHERE shop.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND shop.TYPEID = 1 GROUP BY shop.ID ORDER BY shop.ISSHOW DESC,shop.PRIORITY,shop.ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hm_pub_shop (SHOPNAME,TYPEID,ISSHOW,ADDRESS,SERVICEPHONE,COMPANYID,PRIORITY) SELECT #{shopName},#{typeId},#{showFlag},#{address},#{servicePhone},#{companyId},( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(PRIORITY),0)+1 FROM hm_pub_shop WHERE COMPANYID = #{companyId})
mapper.select: SELECT shop.ID,shop.SHOPNAME,shop.TYPEID,shop.ISSHOW,shop.PRIORITY,shop.ADDRESS,shop.SERVICEPHONE,shop.COMPANYID FROM hm_pub_shop shop WHERE shop.SHOPNAME = #{shopName} AND shop.TYPEID = 1 AND shop.COMPANYID = #{companyId}

SELECT shop.ID,shop.SHOPNAME,shop.ISSHOW,shop.PRIORITY,shop.COMPANYID FROM hm_pub_shop shop WHERE shop.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND shop.TYPEID = 1 AND shop.ISSHOW = 1 ORDER BY shop.ISSHOW DESC,shop.PRIORITY,shop.ID

SELECT c.ID,c.SHOPNAME,c.TYPEID,c.ISSHOW,c.PRIORITY,c.ADDRESS,c.SERVICEPHONE,c.COMPANYID FROM hm_crm_type_channel_group_rela tcgr INNER JOIN hm_pub_shop c ON c.COMPANYID = tcgr.COMPANYID AND c.ID = tcgr.SHOPID WHERE tcgr.COMPANYID = #{companyId} and tcgr.GROUPID = #{groupId} AND c.ISSHOW =1 GROUP BY c.SHOPNAME
SELECT ADDRESS,SERVICEPHONE FROM hm_pub_shop WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT shop.ID,shop.SHOPNAME,gs.STAFFID,sf.NICKNAME STAFFNAME FROM hm_pub_shop shop INNER JOIN hm_pub_group grp ON grp.COMPANYID = shop.COMPANYID AND shop.ID = grp.SHOPID INNER JOIN hm_pub_group_staff gs ON gs.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID AND grp.GROUPID = gs.GROUPID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff sf ON gs.STAFFID = sf.ID AND gs.COMPANYID = sf.COMPANYID WHERE shop.ISSHOW = 1 AND shop.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND sf.ISDEL = 0 AND sf.ISLOCK = 0 ORDER BY shop.ID
select shopId from hm_crm_shop_detail where companyid=#{companyId} and FROM_UNIXTIME(CREATETIME, '%Y/%m/%d')=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{time}, '%Y/%m/%d') and shopid=#{shopId} and type=#{type}
